name: A City With No People
description:
An experimental narrative about my home Miami, FL. I wanted to explore a new way to make stories, and thus I made my first twine game. This game was made on Twine 1.4 and the images and gifs were all made on Adobe Photoshop cs4.

Please fullscreen this game

For more art and game dev by me, check out my website: http://akgamedev.weebly.com/
